fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- There is no effect for landing on or passing by this space.
- Allows other Jail-related Cards and Spaces to exist. Cards referring to Jail also refer to College as if it was Jail.
- Jailed players are referred to as "Studying" by the host, and cannot move while Studying.
- On the first or second turn of Studying, a player may leave College at no cost.
- After leaving college, a player receives one chance card for each turn they spent in College.
- Studying players are automatically released after the third turn of studying and gain a chest card if they are released this way.
- Studying players can still bid for, sell, mortgage, and trade properties. They can also collect rent from their opponents.
